notLoggedIn.title: You are not logged in
notLoggedIn.subtitle: Would you like to continue using the app without logging in, or would you prefer to register/login?
notLoggedIn.continueExplanation: if you want to use app without account (some functionality might be limited)
notLoggedIn.registerExplanation: in case you want to create a new account
notLoggedIn.loginExplanation: in case you have existing account
